sources.title: Black Dragons
sources.description: It is prior to the commencement of World War II, and Japan's fiendish Black Dragon Society is hatching an evil plot with the Nazis. They instruct a brilliant scientist, Dr. Melcher, to travel to Japan on a secret mission. There he operates on six Japanese conspirators, transforming them to resemble six American leaders. The actual leaders are murdered and replaced with their likeness and Dr. Melcher is condemned to a lifetime of imprisonment so the secret may die with him.

sources.title: Black Dragons
sources.description: A cabal of American industrialists, all fifth-columnists intent on sabotaging the war effort, are methodically murdered by the malevolent Monsieur Colomb. It is only until detective Dick Martin is assigned to the case that everyone's true motives and identities are revealed.

 A cabal of American industrialists, all fifth-columnists intent on sabotaging the war effort, are methodically murdered by the malevolent Monsieur Colomb. It is only until detective Dick Martin is assigned to the case that everyone's true motives and identities are revealed.

sources.title: Black Dragons (1942) Bela Lugosi | Thriller, War Classic Movie
sources.description:
See him pit his terror against Japan's treacherous agents in the U.S.A.!
A cabal of American industrialists, all fifth-columnists intent on sabotaging the war effort, are methodically murdered by the malevolent Monsieur Colomb. It is only until detective Dick Martin is assigned to the case that everyone's true motives and identities are revealed.

Original title: Black Dragons (1942) 


Director: William Nigh
Writers: Harvey Gates, Robert Kehoe
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Joan Barclay, George Pembroke 
Genres: Thriller, War


00:00 Full length movie.
05:40 Intrigue and espionage unfold as a mysterious visitor seeks help from a doctor in a war-torn setting.
11:12 Mystery unfolds as a cab driver finds a body, leading to an investigation involving a doctor and his niece.
15:22 Mysterious events unfold as characters discuss a murder, a patient's condition, and a strange noise.
25:32 Mysterious murders and espionage unfold as individuals search for missing persons in a wartime setting.
37:53 Murder mystery unfolds as bodies linked to Japanese embassy are discovered at uncle's house.
45:34 Mysterious events unfold as a businessman is approached to help solve a series of murders.
52:49 Intrigue unfolds as a spy network's true identities are revealed, leading to a dangerous transformation and a plan to establish a new order.
